title: Accessibility
description: Customize accessibility settings to enhance your experience
highContrastDescription: Improve contrast for visually impaired users
largeTextDescription: Increase text size for better readability
reducedMotionDescription: Reduce or remove animations in the interface
focusModeDescription: Reduce distractions by highlighting only the current element
keyboardShortcutsDescription: Use Alt + letter to quickly toggle accessibility features
altC: Alt + C: Toggle high contrast mode
menuDescription: Use arrow keys to navigate menu items
colorContrastDescription: Adjust color contrast for better visibility
keyboardFocusDescription: Enhanced visual indicators for keyboard focus
readableFontDescription: Use a more readable font throughout the application
textSpacingDescription: Increase spacing between letters, words, and lines
lineHeightDescription: Adjust line height for better readability
customCursorDescription: Use a larger cursor for better visibility
speechRecognitionDescription: Control the application using voice commands
dyslexiaFontDescription: Use a font designed to be more readable for users with dyslexia
keyboardNavigationModeDescription: Optimize the interface for keyboard-only navigation
voiceCommandsDescription: Control the application using your voice
invertColorsDescription: Invert screen colors for reduced eye strain
underlineLinksDescription: Make links more distinguishable with underlines
pauseAnimationsDescription: Temporarily pause all animations on the page
accessibilityProfileDescription: Save your accessibility settings as a profile
autoScrollSpeedDescription: Control the speed of automatic scrolling
snapToElementsDescription: Make the cursor snap to interactive elements
colorFiltersDescription: Apply color filters to improve visibility
